section_a.beneficiaries: BE The company’s activities will provide benefit to ... At Dartmouth Pride, our mission is to be a local Pride for our local LGBTQ+ com- munity. Dartmouth Pride is a Pride for all. We're here to support new same-sex couples in town, celebrate the opening of LGBTQ+ businesses, accompany our friends in the community on their journey to self-discovery as they transition into their true selves, and offer a helping hand to parents supporting their LGBTQ+ chit- dren who have recently come out. We are a Pride for all, committed to serving the diverse needs of our Dartmouth community. We plan to hold events to help support the Queer community in Dart- mouth and are forming this company to be able to more easily help our commu- nity. fated on 23/Q2/ 2024
